name: Common Weapon
description: A standard issue weapon favored by most warriors. Reliable but unremarkable in design.

name: Uncommon Weapon
description: A weapon with improved craftsmanship and minor enhancements, offering better performance than the common version.

name: Rare Weapon
description: A finely crafted weapon imbued with subtle magical properties, sought after by skilled fighters.

name: Legendary Weapon
description: An extraordinary weapon of mythic quality, said to be forged by the gods themselves.

name: Artifact Weapon
description: A one-of-a-kind weapon with immense power and storied history. Its origin is shrouded in legend.

name: Common Armor
description: Standard armor offering basic protection for the average fighter.

name: Uncommon Armor
description: Improved armor with additional reinforcement and design, providing better defense.

name: Rare Armor
description: A suit of armor crafted with superior materials and design, offering excellent protection and style.

name: Legendary Armor
description: Armor of legend, renowned for its nearly impenetrable design and the power it bestows upon its wearer.

name: Artifact Armor
description: A unique piece of armor of mythical origins, said to be imbued with divine protection and mystery.

name: Common Wondrous Item
description: A simple but useful item imbued with minor enchantments, often seen among common folk.

name: Uncommon Wondrous Item
description: A well-crafted wondrous item with subtle magical effects that enhance everyday life.

name: Rare Wondrous Item
description: An exquisite and magical item that is highly valued for its beauty and mystical properties.

name: Legendary Wondrous Item
description: A wondrous item of great renown and power, steeped in lore and mystery.

name: Artifact Wondrous Item
description: An unparalleled item of magical wonder, a true artifact with powers beyond mortal comprehension.
